rows.label: tlk41200126_03_msg0001
rows.name:
People who evacuated from
Acedia and Superbia have
come to Torigoth Base.

rows.label: tlk41200126_03_msg0002
rows.name:
We're going to hold a Torigonda concert
soon, in the hopes that it will soothe
their sadness, even just a little.

rows.label: tlk41200126_03_msg0004
rows.name:
...It might be tough for them now,
but I hope they can enjoy it.
